EmailTemplate.name: 11_04_2014 OpenSky Webinar #1.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Win a Quadcopter RC Drone | Hyperscaling VDI & IT Operations
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Transforming IT Infrastructure for the Cloud Age
How to Deliver Real-Time Automation & Hyperscale Operations {{lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}, We love hosting webinars <http://vmturbo.com/resources/#webinars?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=opensky&utm_content=110414>. We love giving away drone copters. So here's another chance for you to join us, and win a drone: Join OpenSky's Don McKeith to learn how he helped a Fortune 50 International Health Insurer client develop a ground-up orchestration framework for its virtual infrastructure, and onboard more than 25,000 zero-downtime VDI seats in less than four years. How quickly could {{company.company name:default=your company}} scale if the business called for it? Join us on November 12 <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webinar-opensky-orchestration/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=opensky&utm_content=110414> to glean insights for your team directly from Mr. McKeith. And win that drone. Register Now <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webinar-opensky-orchestration/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=opensky&utm_content=110414> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
